body: Reading the serie after a year. It's a good wholesome manga. I wish Chizuku would have apologized for what she did in the last chapter when she lost her head and forced yu to have sex with her but I'm ok
This series was amazing! Was distracted by how wholesome the story was
My heart is cumming
The story and the hentainess was well-balanced, art was pretty good, story could be more longer but it was enough, explanation was enough. 8.6/10
Hmm..sort of left unsatisfied since the last chapter was sooo well you have read it, a bit rushed would have enjoyed seeing this be explained a bit more, still a good read.
Damn. That was good. Kinda wish the ending was a bit longer. But overall, I like it!
Pretty great storyline. I like it when it gets depressing only to be shot back to uplifting again. 8/10
The angles on these girls are amazing. Pages 19, 20 and 23 are worth living for. Top 100 doujin series for sure.
TBH we need more explanation
Feel like this was a bit rushed, but still good
FUCK YEAH!!!

Ugh, it was good but that break up seemed so sudden, but it was ignored so fast, they immediately jumped into being lovey dovey in seconds without actually talking it. I know this is hentai but it seemed a little bit to forced, but overall, this chapter was probably a 7,5 or 8/10
Guys don’t Worry two more Chapters then the end
I’m not crying ur crying
Ugh, that's just so good I really love it. Fucking wholesome I really love this kind of yuri and ohhh? It's the end?!?! :( I want more of this please make more of it I will be sad huhuhu :(

The ending was... good. I liked it, but i'm still not satisfied. I was hoping for more interactions with the other two girls. Also the way they make up makes it seem like nothing happened at all. There really should have been at least an extra chapter in between 7 and 8 to solidify their break up instead of a huge time skip (and maybe some more action between the other two girls). But overall solid 8.5/10 would recommend.
Hmm 7 chapter made it hard for me too give this a higher rating.Overall :9/10.
What a nice story, simple and “clean” hahahahaha,
Muito bom.
Only thing that this series could improve upon is the art, other than that it's pretty good
Ahh what a nice ending i might cry
This really feels like there should have been at least a couple more chapters between 7 and 8. At least do more with the other two girls in the interim.
I'm not satisfied with the way they make up just like nothing happened. Well... at least it had a decent end
*Shizuku I mean lol

I like happy endings but I hated this one, I dunno why but I started crying when they talked to each other again and Suzuki confessed her feelings, I cried cuz I didn't want it to go like that...I feel frustrated for some reason lol
Was it just me or did it feel like some of the art was incomplete this chapter?
7/10. Another chapter between 7 - 8 would have made of this a better end. Still good enough. I'd read it again.
It’s so hard to say goodbye to yesterday (ᗒᗣᗕ)՞
Pukeeeee boooooring
That's it? I want more.
All is right with the world again.. and hopefully there's more to come in the near future
Kinda wish there was a little more.
So it is end? That's it?
feel like this ending is super forced... she basically gets raped, stops all contact with her rapist for months and then suddenly gets back together on graduation day? hmmm
